messages.subject: Homeschool / Unschool Graduaiton ceremony in Maryland
messages.msgSnippet: Anyone who is interested in a graduation ceremony for you unschooler/ homeschooler  for this year and next year, please contact me,  Earlene Sorrells as soon
messages.messageBody:
Anyone who is interested in a graduation ceremony for you unschooler/ homeschooler for this year and next year, please contact me, Earlene Sorrells as soon as possible via email or phone.
It will possibly be held at Antietam Battlefield near Sharpsburg, MD. and will be set up through the Western Maryland Homeschool Association.
If there is enough interests, we may do one for this year either in Ausgust or september or we could combine this years with next years ceremony.


If you are interested in being a speaker at a ceremony, please let me know as well.

Please include the following info when you contact me:
Are you interested in a cap and gown and tassel?
Are you interested in a diploma?
And a diploma cover?

Is your child interested in speaking to the class?


Please email me with the subject line as> graduation ceremony at:
westernmarylandhomeschool@...
or call me at 301-582-0716
Please pass this around to anyone who may be interested.
Thanks,

Earlene Sorrells
